ComicInfo.Summary:
With all the Lumberjanes together in The Land of Lost Things, there is only one clear option when stuck in a pocket dimension-explore! But being in another dimension is dangerous, and when Ripley wanders off on her own into the middle of a bitter-cold pocket-dimension winter, the Roanokes' fun vacation to another realm might end up being too cool to handle!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Kat Leyh | 1 | Sub | Preorder Cover | Chan Chau | 2 |
